name: READY SET DRESS!
description:
BIG thanx to Tim from ‘Game Dev Underground’ for inspiring me to enter this game jam!

PROVE UR THE RADDEST GIRL ON WHEELS!!

This is my first ludum dare entry ^__^

Everything was by me from scratch in under 48hrs.

Controls:

Z = cycles through outfits

X = dresses girl into the selected outfit

LEFT & RIGHT arrow keys turn car.

ESC: quits game

How to play:

you are the ginger girl on the right.

you must dress your girl to match the bottom icons in order left to right.

each round is a best 2 out of 3, win a round over the blonde girl to score a point.

crashing the car loses you 1 point.

5 points to win the game.

GOOD LUCK….ITS CRAZY! XD
